alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Randolph (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 9:03PM CDT until May 14 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Monroe County in southwestern Illinois... Northwestern Randolph County in southwestern Illinois... Northwestern Ste. Genevieve County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 902 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bloomsdale, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bloomsdale. This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 157 and 162. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
